Before applying, please review the following to ensure your application process goes smoothly.

The application below will automatically populate your job history from your Workday profile. You may edit it below or you may follow the steps to update this information in your profile, especially if you plan to apply to multiple roles and do not wish to edit each time.
• From Workday, click “View Profile” at the top right corner.
• Under the “Summary” tab, click edit to update your “Job History” to reflect your most recent skills and work history, including your current position.

After you’ve completed these steps, come back to this application page and you’re ready to apply!

The SHOW comes alive at MGM Resorts International.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to work in a place full of excitement, diversity, and entertainment? Are you enthusiastic about being a team player in one of the most fascinating industries in the world? At MGM Resorts, we seek individuals like YOU to create unique and show-stopping experiences for our guests.

THE JOB:

As a Digital Customer & Marketing Analytics Analyst you will conduct in-depth analysis of our marketing media campaigns to identify trends, patterns and areas for improvement. Also, you will contribute and maintain key performance indicators (KPIs) and dashboards to monitor the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams and present your findings to our stakeholders by utilizing advanced analytics tools, querying databases, and building dashboards.

THE DAY-TO-DAY:
• Develop and maintain reports, dashboards, and insights to highlight digital customer trends, omni-channel & digital A/B performance and provide recommendations on areas of opportunity for our media teams.
• Work with teams to identify and standardized digital tagging needs to appropriately track and analyze performance and attribution modeling.
• Query and analyze complex data sets and extract key insights using various economic, financial, customer and marketing methodologies.
• Support the development of methodologies to measure and improve the effectiveness of media spend across multiple touchpoints, brands, and business units through the implementation of governance and standardization around digital data.
• Collaborate across teams; Marketing Analytics, Media, Direct Marketing and Digital Ventures to develop analytical capabilities and identify trends and insights impacting website visitation and conversion.
• Prepare and participate in ongoing Commercial & Marketing reviews across COE’s and properties.
• Perform ad-hoc data analysis based on needs of the business.

THE IDEAL CANDIDATE:
• Takes pride in their work.
• Describes themselves as detail oriented.
• Can handle multiple tasks at one time.
• Thrives on engaging in analytical tasks and effectively communicates discoveries.
• Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience plus at least 1 year of prior related experience.
• Prior experience with using programming languages/query tools such as SQL, SaaS, Python or R.
• Working knowledge of digital analytics tools such as Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Excel or Power BI.
• Working knowledge of paid or ogranic social media.
• Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in digital marketing and analytics.

THE PERKS & BENEFITS:
• Wellness incentive programs to help you stay healthy physically and mentally.
• Access to company hotel, food and beverage, retail, and entertainment discounts as well as discounts with company partners on things like travel, electronics, online shopping, and more.
• Free meals in our employee dining room.
• Free parking on and off shift.
• Healthcare, financial (401K & 401K Matching), and time off benefits.
• Professional and personal development through programs and networking opportunities as well as volunteer opportunities in the community

Are you ready to JOIN THE SHOW? Apply today!
